intro: Psychotria brachyloba, commonly known as the short-leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to Central and South America, particularly found in tropical rainforests. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found growing in shaded, humid environments. The plant contains various alkaloids, making it of interest in botanical and pharmacological research.
